subject: Mental Health
title: Complex PTSD
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Complex PTSD.

hook.text: Standard PTSD describes trauma from one event. But what about years of abuse?

buildup.text: Complex PTSD, recognized by the WHO in 2018, adds deeper identity disruption.

discovery.text: Survivors struggle with self-worth, emotional regulation, and maintaining relationships.

twist.text: It's often misdiagnosed as borderline personality disorder because symptoms overlap.

climax.text: Recognizing C-PTSD means survivors finally get the right name for their suffering.

punchline.text: The right diagnosis is the first step toward the right treatment.

quiz.question: When did the WHO officially recognize Complex PTSD?
